publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1577 Alasdair Morgan: Patsy Drysdale: Grandparent of the Yearâ€”That the Parliament notes that Stranraer carer Patsy Drysdale has been crowned Grandparent of the Year 2008 by Age Concern; recognises that this award is fitting commendation of her own personal courage and selflessness, and extends congratulations to Mrs Drysdale and her fellow kinship carers involved in YANA (You are not Alone) Wigtownshire.
S3M-1577 Patsy Drysdale: Grandparent of the Year (lodged on 14 March 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-1577 Patsy Drysdale: Grandparent of the Year (lodged on 14 March 2008) Bob Doris*
